name: BiblicalAffirmations
0:
”Alexa, open biblical affirmations”
”Alexa, start biblical affirmations”
”Alexa, ask biblical affirmations for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: biblical affirmations
des: The Bible offers a great deal of encouragement to its readers. This skill shares many of them. They are presented in first person, or I format, followed by the location of each Scripture. May God bless you!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
